title: Spirited Away Showing at JAFAX!
content:
JAFAX is excited to partner with Celebration Cinema to bring our attendees a very special movie viewing experience for this year's JAFAX convention. Celebration Cinema will be hosting a viewing of Spirited Away (subtitled) at their Studio Park location as part of their Sunset Cinema Series. This will be a FREE movie viewing experience held outdoors on the piazza at Studio Park. You don't need tickets to attend!

Spirited Away will play at 7:00PM on Saturday, June 25. JAFAX suggests those interested in attending plan to leave the convention center at 6:30pm to allow enough time to get to the venue and get a good seat for the show! Attendees should plan an 11 to 14 minute walk to the theater from the convention center.

What do I need to know?

  • This event is FREE!
  • The movie starts at 7:00PM on Saturday, June 25
  • Space is first come, first serve - so plan to arrive a little early to ensure you get the best possible viewing spot! We suggest leaving the conference center at 6:30pm to allow enough time to get to the theater and find a good seat, purchase refreshments, etc.
  • Bring a blanket or chair to sit on as this will be outside on the Studio Park Piazza, a courtyard lawn. (Studio Park will have a limited number of seating spaces available, but it's first come, first serve!)
  • This is a family friendly event and children are welcome!
  • You can bring snacks OR purchase refreshments at the theater! There are PLENTY of food and beverage options surrounding the piazza, including Studio Park's new snack and beverage trailer, which does serve beer and wine (must be 21 years of age or older and show ID)
  • The theater is within walking distance of the convention center and hotel (approximately 0.5 miles, or 11 minutes walking)
  • Paid parking is also available at the theater garage

More questions? Check out the Sunset Cinema Piazza Event FAQ!

Location

Celebration Cinema Studio Park
123 Ionia Ave SW, Grand Rapids, MI 49503
